content:
Hi,

we use self hosted jitis with jwt auth... how to integrate it in zulip?

Thx!

Erik

This appears to currently be a server-level settings, see https://zulip.com/integrations/doc/jitsi, so if self-hosting that should be configurable. #17914 is an issue tracking this to be organization-specific, such as allowing this to be configured for different organizations on Zulip Cloud.
sorry i dont understand, both jitsi and zulip is self hosted and yes in settings.py i set url to my jitsi server. but my jitsi server ist secured with a jwt Authentication Tokens.
Ah, apologies, for that specific way of integrating someone else will need to respond. Also see #integrations > jitsi jwt.
This topic was moved here from #general > jitsi jwt by Alya Abbott.
